lead_paragraph: American women's volleyball captain Christa Dietzen is buzzing at the prospect of playing in one of the sport's heartlands but, with the U.S. having lost to Brazil in the last two Olympic finals, there is some steel behind the Rio love-in.

headline.print_headline: Love Brazil, Beat Brazil-U.S. Women on a Mission
headline.main: Love Brazil, Beat Brazil-U.S. Women on a Mission
